Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: to kya vah ye nahin jaanata ki jab murde qabron se nikaale jaenge
aur dilon ke bhed zaahir kar die jaenge
beshak us din unaka paravaradigaar unase khoob vaaqif hoga
khadakhadaane vaalee
vah khadakhadaane vaalee kya hai
aur tum ko kya maaloom ki vah khadakhadaane vaalee kya hai
jis din log (maidaane hashr mein) tiddiyon kee tarah phaile honge
aur pahaad dhunakee huee rooee ke se ho jaenge
to jisake (nek aamaal) ke palle bhaaree honge
vah man bhaate aish mein honge
aur jinake aamaal ke palle halke honge
to unaka thikaana na raha
aur tumako kya maaloom haaviya kya hai
vah dahakatee huee aag hai
kul va maal kee bahutaayat ne tum logon ko gaafil rakha
yahaan tak ki tum logon ne kabren dekhee (mar gae)
dekho tumako anaqareeb hee maalum ho jaega
phir dekho tumhen anaqareeb hee maaloom ho jaega
dekho agar tumako yaqeenee taur par maaloom hota (to haragiz gaaphil na hote)
tum log zaroor dozakh ko dekhoge
phir tum log yaqeenee dekhana dekhoge
phir tumase neamaton ke baaren zaroor baaz purs kee jaegee
namaaze asr kee qasam
beshak insaan ghaate mein hai
magar jo log eemaan lae, aur achchhe kaam karate rahe aur aapas mein haq ka hukm aur sabr kee vaseeyat karate rahe
har taana dene vaale chugalakhor kee kharaabee hai
jo maal ko jama karata hai aur gin gin kar rakhata hai
vah samajhata hai ki usaka maal use hamesha zinda baaqee rakhega
haragiz nahin vah to zaroor hutama mein daala jaega
aur tumako kya maaloom hatama kya hai
vah khuda kee bhadakaee huee aag hai jo (talave se lagee to) dilon tak chadh jaegee
ye log aag ke lambe sutoono
mein daal kar band kar die
jaenge
ai rasool kya tumane nahin dekha ki tumhaare paravaradigaar ne haathee vaalon ke saath kya kiya
kya usane unakee tamaam tadbeeren galat nahin kar deen (zaroor)
aur un par jhund kee jhund chidiyaan bhej deen
jo un par kharanjon kee kankariyaan phekatee theen
to unhen chabae hue bhoos kee (tabaah) kar diya
choonki quraish ko jaade aur garmee ke safar se maanoos kar diya hai
to unako maanoos kar dene kee vajah se
is ghar (kaaba) ke maalik kee ibaadat karanee chaahie
jisane unako bhookh mein khaana diya aur unako khauf se aman ata kiya
kya tumane us shakhsh ko bhee dekha hai jo roz jaza ko jhuthalaata hai
ye to vahee (kambakht) hai jo yateem ko dhakke deta hai
aur mohataajon ko khilaane ke lie (logon ko) aamaada nahin karata
to un namaaziyon kee tabaahee hai
jo apanee namaaz se gaaphil rahate hain
jo dikhaane ke vaaste karate hain
aur rozamarra kee maaloolee cheezen bhee aariyat nahin dete
(ai rasool) hamanen tumako ko kausar ata kiya
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee namaaz padha karo
aur qurbaanee diya karo beshak tumhaara dushman be aulaad rahega
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki ai kaaphiron
tum jin cheezon ko poojate ho, main unako nahin poojata
aur jis (khuda) kee main ibaadat karata hoon usakee tum ibaadat nahin karate
aur jinhen tum poojate ho main unaka poojane vaala nahin
aur jisakee main ibaadat karata hoon usakee tum ibaadat karane vaale nahin
tumhaare lie tumhaara deen mere lie mera deen
ai rasool jab khuda kee madad aa pahanchegee
aur phateh (makka) ho jaegee aur tum logon ko dekhoge ki gol ke gol khuda ke deen mein daakhil ho rahe hain
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee taareef ke saath tasabeeh karana aur usee se magapherat kee dua maangana vah beshak bada maaf karane vaala hai
abu lahab ke haath toot jaen aur vah khud satyaanaas ho jae
(aakhir) na usaka maal hee usake haath aaya aur (na) usane kamaaya
vah bahut bhadakatee huee aag mein daakhil hoga
aur usakee joroo bhee jo sar par eendhan uthae phiratee hai
aur usake gale mein batee huee rassee bandhee hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki khuda ek hai
khuda barahaq beniyaaz hai
na usane kisee ko jana na usako kisee ne jana
aur usaka koee hamasar nahin
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main subah ke maalik kee
har cheez kee buraee se jo usane paida kee panaah maangata hoon
aur andhereeraat kee buraee se jab usaka andhera chha jae
aur gandon par phoonkane vaaliyon kee buraee se
(jab phoonke) aur hasad karane vaale kee buraee se
(ai rasool) tum kah do main logon ke paravaradigaar
logon ke baadashaah
logon ke maabood kee (shaitaanee)
vasavase kee buraee se panaah maangata hoon
jo (khuda ke naam se) peechhe hat jaata hai jo logon ke dilon mein vasavase daala karata hai
jinnaat mein se khvaah aadamiyon mein se
